section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the judgment and opinion of the Court to announce in No. 73-6336, Rogers against United States.

And for reasons stated in an opinion filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit is reversed and the case is remanded for further proceedings consistent with the opinion.
Mr. Justice Marshall with whom Mr. Justice Douglas joined filed a concurring opinion.
